class.name: LuaSyntaxHighlighter
class.brief_description: A CodeHighlighter subclass specialized for Lua code highlighting.

method.name: fill_editor_colors
method.description: Editor-only method that copies colors setup in "Text Editor/Theme" editor settings to this CodeHighlighter. It is available in the Inspector as the "Fill with Editor colors" tool button.

members.member: Color used for Lua comments. Setting this property will setup [member CodeHighlighter.color_regions] for Lua comments.
Callable for [method fill_editor_colors], available in the Inspector as the "Fill with Editor colors" tool button.
Color used for Lua keywords. Setting this property will setup [member CodeHighlighter.keyword_colors] for Lua keywords.

Color used for Lua member keywords [code]self[/code], [code]_G[/code], [code]_ENV[/code] and [code]_VERSION[/code]. Setting this property will setup [member CodeHighlighter.member_keyword_colors] for Lua member keywords.
Color used for Lua strings. Setting this property will setup [member CodeHighlighter.color_regions] for Lua strings.
